<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
ACCOUNTING
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/08/15/ges-accounting-practices-targeted-madoff-whistleblower?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Episode 1: GE Accounting Scandal
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<!--[if mso]>
<img alt="Episode 1: GE Accounting Scandal" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" height=447 src="https://media.giphy.com/media/U7nhyiclR928U8DT6A/giphy.gif">
<![endif]-->
<!--[if !mso]>--><!-- -->
<img class="story-header-image" alt="Episode 1: GE Accounting Scandal" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" src="https://media.giphy.com/media/U7nhyiclR928U8DT6A/giphy.gif">
<!--<![endif]-->
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Francis Scialabba</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Shonda Rhimes appears to have directed yesterday’s biz news, because a bombshell <a href="https://apnews.com/9038966600c542b2a856cfffc56de600?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">whistleblower report</a> targeted GE’s (-11.30%) accounting practices. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Adding to the intrigue:</strong> <a href="https://www.gefraud.com?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">The report</a> was released by Harry Markopolos, a forensic accountant who also raised the alarm about Bernie Madoff’s Ponzi scheme. </p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">The allegations </h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Markopolos alleged that GE’s flawed accounting practices…</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Are “a </span><span><a href="https://finance.yahoo.com/news/madoff-whistleblower-claims-ge-committing-accounting-fraud-131211577.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">bigger fraud than Enron</a></span><span>” </span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Add up to $38 billion in fraud, or around 40% of GE's market value </span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Mean GE’s debt-to-equity ratio would go from the 3:1 it reported at the end of Q2 to a whopping 17:1 if reported properly </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Markopolos also said the industrial conglomerate would need to boost its insurance reserves by $18.5 billion in cash and <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2019/08/15/ge-shares-drop-after-madoff-whistleblower-harry-markopolos-raises-red-flags-on-its-accounting.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">might have to file</a> for bankruptcy. </p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">The “how dare you, sir”</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">GE denied all of it, saying the company has a “strong liquidity position, committed credit lines, and several executable options to monetize assets," plus it takes vitamins every morning. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>GE is </span><span><a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/ge-powered-the-american-centurythen-it-burned-out-11544796010?mod=article_inline&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">currently being investigated</a></span><span> by the SEC and DOJ over potential accounting issues related to its insurance and power divisions. It has denied any accounting fraud and says it is working with investigators. </span>
</li>
</ul>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">Here’s where it really reminds us of <em>Scandal </em>
</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Markopolos said he and his colleagues are working with an unnamed hedge fund that’s shorting GE stock, leading CEO Larry Culp to accuse Markopolos of trying to profit off the accusations.  </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>The WSJ </span><span><a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/ge-is-new-target-of-madoff-whistleblower-11565866617?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">points out</a></span><span> that if that’s the angle, Markopolos’s timing could have been better. GE stock dropped from $30 to $7 from early 2017 to the end of 2018 as the company tried to streamline a bloated business. </span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Looking ahead...</strong>Markopolos said his group is planning to take its findings to the SEC. <span>Meanwhile, Culp bought $2 million of GE stock yesterday to demonstrate his confidence in the company.</span></p>

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">

<td style="padding-top: 12px;">

<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
SELF-DRIVING
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/08/15/ups-takes-minority-stake-tusimple?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
What Can TuSimple Do for You?
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="What Can TuSimple Do for You?" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiIxNTY1OTA3NjYwLmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im1vcm5pbmdicmV3LW9zbG8iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>TuSimple</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">UPS said yesterday its venture arm <a href="https://techcrunch.com/2019/08/15/ups-takes-minority-stake-in-self-driving-truck-startup-tusimple/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">acquired</a> a minority stake in TuSimple, an autonomous trucking startup. The two also revealed they’ve been <a href="https://www.theverge.com/2019/8/15/20805994/ups-self-driving-trucks-autonomous-delivery-tusimple?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">testing</a> cargo routes between Tucson and Phoenix, most of which was hate mail between ASU and UA students. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Refresher: </strong>TuSimple, HQ’d in San Diego and Beijing, was last valued at $1.1 billion. Chief Product Officer Chuck Price did his best to convince Ryan Duffy, our emerging tech writer, that his company’s the leader in the industry. Price said...</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>UPS (-0.15%) is the first investment by a major shipping company into a self-driving startup.</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>TuSimple has the largest self-driving truck fleet “by far.” </span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>A recent </span><span><a href="https://link.morningbrew.com/click/17785665.6207/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cubW9ybmluZ2JyZXcuY29tL2VtZXJnaW5nLXRlY2gvc3Rvcmllcy8yMDE5LzA1LzIzL2xpdmUtc3VuLWJlbHQtbWFpbD91dG1fc291cmNlPW1vcm5pbmdfYnJldw/5c881db32ddf9c27c11a8f77B13ac6b26?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">two-week pilot</a></span><span> with USPS on one of the U.S.’ busiest freight corridors was successful.  </span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Next steps: </strong>UPS plans to use this partnership to figure out how it will plug autonomous trucks into its massive logistics network. By “late 2020, early 2021,” TuSimple expects to remove the safety driver and engineer currently riding in each truck, Price said.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><em>Want more stories on self-driving vehicles? Sign up for Emerging Tech Brew with one click <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/emerging-tech/welcome/?sailthru_lists[{u('EmTech%20One%20Click')}]=1&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">here</a>. </em></p>

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
INTERNATIONAL
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/08/15/kashmir-conflict-hits-business?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Blackout Brings Kashmir to a Halt
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Earlier this month, the Indian government <a href="https://www.bbc.com/news/world-asia-india-49234708?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">revoked a key provision</a> of its constitution which set the terms of its relationship with Kashmir, the disputed Himalayan territory north of India. It also deployed troops and shut down phone and internet service in Kashmir. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">The blackout is causing serious trouble for the Kashmiri business community. </strong>Businesses have scarce access to cash and <a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2019/08/14/technology/india-kashmir-internet.html?te=1&nl=dealbook&emc=edit_dk_20190815?campaign_id=4&instance_id=11655&segment_id=16173&user_id=6e8f5c5256f51c870f4df90ca819260d&regi_id=8334278520190815&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">can’t get products</a> they'd normally order online, including insulin and baby food. That’s brought operations to a screeching halt. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">The backstory: </strong>The Kashmir region has been contested pretty much ever since the British Empire divided up the province it called Bengal in 1947. Both Pakistan and India have claimed sovereignty and split administration of the area. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">More recently, Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s Hindu nationalist government has been using internet shutdowns to tamp down dissent all over the country. Now his government <a href="https://www.axios.com/kashmir-constitution-article-370-india-modi-bjp-ddcb5b9f-c51b-4fe9-8b90-35cdcadbff51.html?utm_source=newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=newsletter_axioslogin&stream=top&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">aims</a> to divide up Kashmir and tighten its control more than the old provision allowed. BBC reporter Aamir Peerzada <a href="https://www.bbc.com/news/world-asia-india-49231619?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">described</a> the mood in the Kashmiri city of Srinagar as “an atmosphere of fear.”</p>

<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
HEALTHCARE
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/08/15/fda-proposing-new-health-warnings-cigarette-packs-advertisements?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
For the FDA, a Picture’s Worth 1,000 Lives
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="No Alt" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC83MjM1L3dsXzNwYWNrc19sMTYwMHg5MDBfbG9nb18wODA4MTlfanBnLmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im9zbG8tcHJvZHVjdGlvbiIsImVkaXRzIjp7InJlc2l6ZSI6eyJ3aWR0aCI6MTAwMCwiaGVpZ2h0IjpudWxsfX19">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>FDA</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Yesterday, the FDA <a href="https://www.fda.gov/news-events/press-announcements/fda-proposes-new-required-health-warnings-color-images-cigarette-packages-and-advertisements-promote?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">proposed</a> new health warnings for cigarette packs and advertisements, including graphic images portraying some lesser-known side effects of smoking. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Despite the best efforts of D.A.R.E. instructors, 34 million adults and 1.4 million youths in the U.S. smoke. It’s an expensive and deadly habit that annually costs 480,000 lives and $300 billion in healthcare and lost productivity.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The FDA tried this tactic in 2011, but Big Tobacco sued and got the courts to throw out the rule. That means tobacco warnings have looked the same since the Reagan administration.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>The rest of the world’s not waiting. More than 91 countries have </span><span><a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2019/08/15/health/cigarettes-warnings-fda.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">adopted</a></span><span> labels that cover at least half the package. </span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>The World Health Organization says graphic images are the most effective deterrent to smoking, but some studies found these labels could inadvertently offend people's beliefs in consumer freedom. </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">This is awkward.</strong> There have been a few instances of individuals <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/society/shortcuts/2018/jan/28/how-my-dead-body-ended-up-on-millions-of-cigarette-packets-across-europe?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">not knowing</a> about or <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/world/2019/jul/18/amputated-leg-image-on-tobacco-warning-used-without-consent?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">consenting to</a> photos of them used in graphic anti-smoking campaigns.</p>

<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
QUIZ
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/08/15/quizzed-girl-liked?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
I Quizzed a Girl and I Liked It
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Inverted before it was cool. More complex than WeWork’s financials. Still ties shoes using bunny ears. It’s the Brew’s Weekly News Quiz. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">1. Scientists announced they sequenced the genome of <strong style="color:#000">which fruit? </strong></p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">2. This product was announced on Tuesday...<strong style="color:#000">what is it?</strong> And for 32 points of extra credit, what is she looking at? </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><img src="https://morningbrew-oslo.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/1565895382.jpg" class="img-responsive" width="540" style="width:100% !important;max-width: 540px;" alt=""></p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">3. CBS and Viacom <em>finally</em> agreed to merge this week. <strong style="color:#000">Which of the following is not a Viacom property:</strong> Paramount Pictures, HGTV, Nickelodeon, or MTV?</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">4. <strong style="color:#000">Fill in the blank: </strong>___________ account for roughly 40%–50% of the world’s solid waste, <a href="https://www.reuters.com/article/us-construction-fund-software/brick-mortar-fund-raises-97-million-to-make-construction-tech-savvy-idUSKCN1V31M1?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">per Reuters</a>. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">5. <strong style="color:#000">Name the company: </strong><strong style="color:#000"> </strong>I am the world’s largest oil producer and I claim to generate one in every eight barrels of the world's crude.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><sup class="sub-text"><em><strong style="color:#000">Answers: </strong>1) Avocado 2) Snap’s Spectacles 3, extra credit = Snap stock  3) HGTV 4) Construction materials 5) Saudi Aramco  </em></sup></p>

<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Just follow these three easy steps:</p>

<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Send your unique referral link to everyone you know. Growth hack: Throw your link in big group chats or “accidentally” hit Reply All on a large email chain. </span></li>

</ol>

href=\"https://finance.yahoo.com/news/madoff-whistleblower-claims-ge-committing-accounting-fraud-131211577.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eAdd up to $38 billion in fraud, or around 40% of GE's market value \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eMean GE’s debt-to-equity ratio would go from the 3:1 it reported at the end of Q2 to a whopping 17:1 if reported href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/ge-powered-the-american-centurythen-it-burned-out-11544796010?mod=article_inline\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ecurrently being investigated\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e by the SEC and DOJ over potential accounting issues related to its insurance and power divisions. It has denied any accounting fraud and says it is working with investigators. \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eHere’s where it really reminds us of \u003cem\u003eScandal \u003c/em\u003e\n\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eMarkopolos said he and his colleagues are working with an unnamed hedge fund that’s shorting GE stock, leading CEO Larry Culp to accuse Markopolos of trying to profit off the accusations.  \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eThe WSJ \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/ge-is-new-target-of-madoff-whistleblower-11565866617?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003epoints out\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e that if that’s the angle, Markopolos’s timing could have been better. Price said...\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eUPS (-0.15%) is the first investment by a major shipping company into a self-driving startup.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eTuSimple has the largest self-driving truck fleet “by far.” \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eA recent \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://link.morningbrew.com/click/17785665.6207/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cubW9ybmluZ2JyZXcuY29tL2VtZXJnaW5nLXRlY2gvc3Rvcmllcy8yMDE5LzA1LzIzL2xpdmUtc3VuLWJlbHQtbWFpbD91dG1fc291cmNlPW1vcm5pbmdfYnJldw/5c881db32ddf9c27c11a8f77B13ac6b26?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003etwo-week pilot\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e with USPS on one of the U.S.’ busiest freight corridors was successful.  \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eNext steps: \u003c/strong\u003eUPS plans to use this partnership to figure out how it will plug autonomous trucks into its massive logistics network. By “late 2020, early 2021,” TuSimple expects to remove the safety driver and engineer currently riding in each truck, Price said.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cem\u003eWant more stories on self-driving vehicles? style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eEarlier this month, the Indian government \u003ca href=\"https://www.bbc.com/news/world-asia-india-49234708?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003erevoked a key provision\u003c/a\u003e of its constitution which set the terms of its relationship with Kashmir, the disputed Himalayan territory north of India. It also deployed troops and shut down phone and internet service in Kashmir. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eThe blackout is causing serious trouble for the Kashmiri business community. \u003c/strong\u003eBusinesses have scarce access to cash and \u003ca href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2019/08/14/technology/india-kashmir-internet.html?te=1\u0026amp;nl=dealbook\u0026amp;emc=edit_dk_20190815?campaign_id=4\u0026amp;instance_id=11655\u0026amp;segment_id=16173\u0026amp;user_id=6e8f5c5256f51c870f4df90ca819260d\u0026amp;regi_id=8334278520190815\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ecan’t get products\u003c/a\u003e they'd normally order online, including insulin and baby food. That’s brought operations to a screeching halt. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eThe backstory: \u003c/strong\u003eThe Kashmir region has been contested pretty much ever since the British Empire divided up the province it called Bengal in 1947. Both Pakistan and India have claimed sovereignty and split administration of the area. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eMore recently, Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s Hindu nationalist government has been using internet shutdowns to tamp down dissent all over the country. Now his government \u003ca href=\"https://www.axios.com/kashmir-constitution-article-370-india-modi-bjp-ddcb5b9f-c51b-4fe9-8b90-35cdcadbff51.html?utm_source=newsletter\u0026utm_medium=email\u0026utm_campaign=newsletter_axioslogin\u0026stream=top\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eaims\u003c/a\u003e to divide up Kashmir and tighten its control more than the old provision allowed. BBC reporter Aamir Peerzada \u003ca href=\"https://www.bbc.com/news/world-asia-india-49231619?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003edescribed\u003c/a\u003e the mood in the Kashmiri city of Srinagar as “an atmosphere of fear.”\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS
